description:
🎮 PLAYDATE – Official Trailer (2025) | Alan Ritchson Action Movie on Prime Video  🎮
When playtime becomes a battlefield — unlock the danger. PlayDate is the high-stakes new action thriller heading to Prime Video, where nothing is safe and every move counts.

Film Overview
Alan Richardson plays Eli Turner, a former agent whose quiet life is shattered when his daughter is kidnapped. The only way to find her: accept a sinister contract to “play” a deadly game. As players drop one by one, Eli must fight through brutal trials if he ever hopes to bring her home.

A huge thank you to All of our Channel Members! 
Ya'll really do keep the lights on for us over here.
- The audio claims for our promotional features are getting out of hand.

PLAYDATE Official Trailer (2025) Alan Richardson, New Action Movies On Prime Video 4K
Enjoy advanced 4K Upscaling and HDR-10 mastering across future trailers. Stay tuned for more.

description:
👽 PREDATOR: BADLANDS – Final Trailer (2025) | Extended Edition in 👽
The hunt has evolved. Predator: Badlands returns with a final extended trailer that reveals new Predator variants, brutal ambushes, and deadly terrain. Get ready — the jungle fights back in full force.

Film Overview👽
Set in a future desert wasteland, a group of survivors stumbles into the most dangerous terrain on Earth — the Badlands. With human threats and evolved Yautja predators closing in from all sides, they must navigate deadly sandstorms, mutated beasts, and the most ruthless hunters yet to survive.

What to Expect

New Predator designs, weapons, and tactics

Expansive world-building in harsh, unforgiving landscapes

Intense, extended action sequences and cinematic reveals

High visuals and deep lore in 4K HDR

A darker, more survival-driven tone

A huge thank you to All of our Channel Members!
